body:
Please welcome three event coordinators to the team! 

  • GrapeSmoothie - head of the referees!
  • Fouled - head of the map department!
  • Atdit - head of the Teamspeak server!
Additionally, we still have:
  • Barney and Tazz - pretty much control everything lmao.
However, we are still looking for somebody to be head of Media. If you are wanting to apply, make your own application in the comments below! Good luck to all applicants!

Be sure to congratulate them :)

Welcome!

title: Unofficial Event Coordinator Additions
